General.Name: Jakarta Setiabudi Internasional
General.Description: PT Jakarta Setiabudi Internasional Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the hospitality and property businesses in Indonesia. The company operates through Hotel, Real Estate, Rental of Office Space, and Retail of Retail Center segments. It offers hotel guestrooms and restaurant services; and sells land and/or buildings, and apartment units. The company was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Jakarta Setiabudi Internasional Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Jan Darmadi Investindo.
